title: Writing her heart: (Hope and Grace Series - Book 3)
features: Her dreams are to write romance novels. His dreams are of her.Nicole Hammond writes romance novels to develop a world of her own choosing, one she can control and where happy endings reign. Because of the deep wounds of her past, Nicole doesn’t want anything to do with God. However, her need to refine her writing skill takes her to the best writing group in town, which just happens to be Christian. Nicole is surprised to find a fun, loving resource to study her craft while learning about herself and God.As Nicole begins to write from her heart, will her wounded soul learn to trust the One who made her heart?Warren Carver never imagined a woman like Nicole would have anything to do with a guy like him. A series of dreams leads him to wonder if behind Nicole’s beautiful appearance beats a wounded heart. Will Warren, a man needing rescue from his own mistakes, be the man to help rescue Nicole?
